name: Apokalypsis
description: The Alpha-Draconian army to which you belong is one of the most powerful of the Galaxy, and you are one of the most capable pilots of this army having fought in countless battles...
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista SP1, Win7 Processor: 2.4 GHz Pentium 4 processor or equivalent Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6 series or better ATI Radeon series card 9500 series or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 130 MB available space Sound Card: yes Additional Notes: keyboard + mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: 64 Bit Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or AMD Athlon X4 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 130 MB available space Sound Card: yes Additional Notes: keyboard + mouse
